modName: Requiem - Character Creation Overhaul Text Patch
summary: Requiem - Character Creation Overhaul Text Patch
descriptionHtml: I made a patch that renames Light Armor to Evasion in the menus for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21587]Character Creation Overhaul[/url]. This is meant to be used withÂ [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem - The Roleplaying Overhaul[/url]. It's a very small and simple patch, so there should be zero compatibility issues with other mods.
author: Golmore
